title: The boys are at it again
description: Looks like the boys are fixing to play a slew of shows here in good ol PDX including a performance at the Kenton Club that will be recorded by a licensed professional for your listening pleasure. Stay tuned for more details.

title: Back to the studio
description: Looks like the boys are heading back to the studio to record some new tracks that will certainly give the engineer a case of ear fatigue they've never experienced before. What will they do this time? a CCR cover? Tune their instruments? perhaps a rendition of an old christian song? either way, they're undoubtedly going to force you to listen to it in the car at least 666 times.

title: the boys are back at it with the first gig in two years
description: Come on out to the Kenton club on sunday may 29th at 9pm to see if the boys can still hold their liquor through their set. featuring sounds from drunk on lomabard, and molly bang! come on its free for god sakes.
